item.title: Comment on Saturday assorted links by Floccina
item.description:
#4 IMHO the biggest difference between Democrats and Libertarians is that democrats believe privilege is a much, much greater force than incentives. They seem to believe that being born to affluent parents gives an insurmountable lead, and that bad incentives will have very small effects.

Comment URL: https://marginalrevolution.com/marginalrevolution/2024/07/saturday-assorted-links-465.html?commentID=160778253
